TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void SavePanelHandler(Cocoa.SavePanel sheet, int returnCode, IntPtr contextInfo);

Docs.param: The SavePanel object that raised the event.
The return code indicating which button was clicked.
The contextInfo object that was specified.
Docs.summary: Defines the shape of methods that are called in response to a savePanelDidEnd event.
Docs.remarks: The return code will be if the OK buton was selected. It will be if the Cancel button was clicked.
